word_mean: 夹子：用于紧握、连接、加压或紧固的器件
夹具：用以加压的外科器械

sentence.Network_en: Banking regulators failed to clamp down until earlier this month.
sentence.Network_cn: 银行监管机构直到本月初才开始严格管制。

sentence.Network_en: Ironically, the latest clamp-down has just led to renewed international criticism.
sentence.Network_cn: 让人哭笑不得的是，最近的制裁结果只是导致新一波国际社会的批评。

sentence.Network_en: Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table.
sentence.Network_cn: 把厚木板的一端用夹具固定在桌子的边上。

jx.jx_en_mean: To become more strict or repressive; impose controls
jx.jx_cn_mean: 变得更严厉或强制；强加控制

lj.lj_ls: 对环境污染者实施管制

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: probably of Dutch or Low German origin and related to clam
late 16th cent. (denoting a pile of bricks for firing): probably from Dutch klamp 'heap'; related to clump

entry.def: A clamp is a device that holds two things firmly together.
When you clamp one thing to another, you fasten the two things together with a clamp.

example.ex: Somebody forgot to bring along the U-bolts to clamp the microphones to the pole.
example.tran: 有人忘了带把麦克风固定在支架上的U形螺栓。

entry.tran: 将…固定(在某处)；紧紧抓住
entry.def: To clamp something in a particular place means to put it or hold it there firmly and tightly.

example.ex: Simon finished dialing and clamped the phone to his ear...
example.tran: 西蒙拨完号，把听筒贴在耳边。

entry.tran: (将违章停放的车辆扣在原地的)夹钳，车轮固定夹
entry.def: A clamp is a large metal device which is fitted to the wheel of an illegally parked car or other vehicle in order to prevent it from being driven away. The driver has to pay to have the clamp removed.
To clamp a car means to fit a clamp to one of its wheels so that it cannot be driven away.

example.ex: Courts in Scotland have ruled it illegal to clamp a car parked on private ground and then to demand a fine.
example.tran: 苏格兰法院裁定，将停在私人地界上的车辆上夹钳并索要罚款的行为是违法的。

means.word_mean: 1. a device (used by carpenters) that holds things firmly together
1. fasten or fix with a clamp;

sentences.sentence: "clamp the chair together until the glue has hardened"
"The military government clamped a curfew onto the capital"

sentences.en: Clamp the two pieces of wood together until the glue dries.
sentences.cn: 用夹钳把两块木板夹紧, 等胶水干了再松开。

sentences.en: He used a clamp to hold the arm on the chair until the glue dried.
sentences.cn: 他用夹子将扶手夹在椅子上, 直到胶水干后再取下。

jushi.chinese: 用夹钳把两块木板夹紧,等胶水干了再松开。

jushi.english: The policeman clamped handcuffs around his wrists.
He used a clamp to hold the arm on the chair until the glue dried.
